definition: used as phonetic bi- or pi-
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

pinyin: yi3 xian1 an4 bi3 luo4 wan2 tong2

definition: piracetam (loanword)/see 乙酰胺吡咯烷酮[yi3 xian1 an4 bi3 luo4 wan2 tong2]

sentences.english: Conclusion The breviscapine injection and piracetam could be combined use directly without dispense abstinence.
sentences.chinese: 花素注射液與吡拉西坦注射液可以直接配伍使用。

sentences.english: As for chronic sinusitis, Moxifloxacin or Cefepime is the first choice.
sentences.chinese: 慢性鼻竇炎治療首選莫西沙星或頭孢吡肟。

sentences.english: Is the time now right for selective gene profiling in clopidogrel patients?
sentences.chinese: 是時候對氯吡格雷治療患者選擇性檢測基因譜嗎？

sentences.english: So clopidogrel could be doubly beneficial, he says.
sentences.chinese: 他說，因此氯吡格雷的益處可能也是雙重性的。

sentences.english: The compound also boosted survival in this strain and another variety of lupus-mimicking mice.
sentences.chinese: 氯吡格雷還提高了這種老鼠和另外一種老鼠的存活率。

sentences.english: Vitamin B6 is also called pyridoxine.
How long the patients should be on Plavix with DES?
sentences.chinese: 藥物支架病人應該服用氯吡格雷多長時間？

sentences.english: We found that effects of bupivacaine was better than other local anesthetics in cervical plexus block.
sentences.chinese: 在頸叢阻滯時，丁吡卡因的阻滯效果優於其它局麻藥。

sentences.english: In addition, zopiclone did not affect infarct volumes.
sentences.chinese: 唑吡酮對腦梗死體積無影響。

sentences.english: On the contrary, fenbendazole and praziquantel appear to have no inhibitory effect on the A caninum egg development.
sentences.chinese: 芬苯達唑和吡喹酮對蟲卵發育無抑制作用。

sentences.english: For cases of mixed infection of cestode or trematode praziquantel was used.
sentences.chinese: 發現絛蟲和吸蟲感染者用吡喹酮驅治。

sentences.english: Patients with clopidogrel resistance had high platelet aggregation and were apt to suffer from cardiovascular events.
sentences.chinese: 氯吡格雷抵抗者血小板聚集率高，易發生心血管事件。

definition: see 呋喃 furan or 呋喃西林 furacilinum
